mapper.select: select count(realpayment) newOrder, sum(realpayment) realpayment from (select ordernum from orderdetail where productnum in (select productnum from product where userid= #{userid})) a join ordertbl b on a.ordernum = b.ordernum where b.orderdate > to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by realpayment

select orderstatus, count(orderstatus) ordercount from ( select ordernum, orderstatus from orderdetail where productnum in (select productnum from product where userid=#{userid})) a join ordertbl b on a.ordernum = b.ordernum where b.orderdate > to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') group by orderstatus

select sum(count(*)) reviewanswer from review where productnum in (select productnum from product where userid=#{userid}) and reviewwritedate > to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and reviewanswer is null group by reviewanswer

select sum(count(*)) qasnwer from userqboard where productnum in (select productnum from product where userid=#{userid}) and qwritedate > to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') and qanswer is null group by qanswer

select
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-1),'yyyy-mm') monthData,
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-2),'yyyy-mm') monthData,
to_char(add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-3),'yyyy-mm') monthData,
sum(orderprice*orderquantity) payData from orderdetail a join (select productnum from product where userid=#{param2}) b on a.productnum = b.productnum where orderconfirm between
add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-1) and last_day(sysdate)
add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-2) and add_months(last_day(sysdate),-1)
add_months(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)+1,-3) and add_months(last_day(sysdate),-2)
and orderstatus = '구매확정' group by a.orderprice
